text: Kuma lalle idan Mun ɗanɗana masa wata rahama daga gareMu, daga bayan wata cuta ta shafe shi, lalle zai ce, "Wannan (ni'ima) tawa ce kuma ba ni zaton Sa'a mai tsayuwa ce, kuma lalle idan aka mayar da ni zuwa ga Ubangijina, haƙiƙa, ina da makoma mafi kyau, a wurin Sa."
